org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.s3
Class GridTcpDiscoveryS3MetricsStore

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.GridTcpDiscoveryMetricsStoreAdapter
      org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.s3.GridTcpDiscoveryS3MetricsStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridTcpDiscoveryMetricsStore
public class GridTcpDiscoveryS3MetricsStore
extends GridTcpDiscoveryMetricsStoreAdapter

AWS S3-based metrics store.

For information about Amazon S3 visit aws.amazon.com.

Configuration

Mandatory

  • AWS credentials (see GridTcpDiscoveryS3MetricsStore.setAwsCredentials(AWSCredentials))

Optional

  • Client configuration (see GridTcpDiscoveryS3MetricsStore.setClientConfiguration(ClientConfiguration))
  • Bucket name suffix (see GridTcpDiscoveryS3MetricsStore.setBucketNameSuffix(String))
  • Metrics expire time (see GridTcpDiscoveryMetricsStoreAdapter.setMetricsExpireTime(int))

The store will create S3 bucket. The name is built in the following way: GridTcpDiscoveryS3MetricsStore.BUCKET_NAME_PREFIX + suffix provided by user (see GridTcpDiscoveryS3MetricsStore.setBucketNameSuffix(String)). If suffix is not provided by user, then GridTcpDiscoveryS3MetricsStore.DFLT_BUCKET_NAME_SUFFIX is used.

The bucket will contain entries with serialized metrics named like the following 94816A59-EB51-44EE-BB67-8B24B9C10A09.

Note that storing data in AWS S3 service will result in charges to your AWS account. Choose another implementation of GridTcpDiscoveryMetricsStore for local or home network tests.
